mapper.select: select student_id, classification, sum(total) as total, sum(correct) as correct from question_statistic where student_id = #{id} group by classification
mapper.insert: insert into question_statistic (student_id, classification, type, total, correct) VALUE (#{qs.studentId}, #{qs.classification, typeHandler=QuestionClassHandler}, #{qs.type, typeHandler=QuestionTypeHandler}, #{qs.total}, #{qs.correct})
